name: matchertests
description: matcher tests for the switch web app
author: Cameron Cooks

scripts.test: cypress run --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config_for_reporters.json --browser chrome --env configFile=dev
scripts.cypress:run:dev: cypress run --browser chrome --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config_for_reporters.json --env configFile=dev
scripts.cypress:run:test: cypress run --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config_for_reporters.json --browser chrome --record --key 5375ae6a-55ac-45ca-8bcd-8b9c4f89c5fa --env configFile=test
scripts.cypress:run:staging: cypress run --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config_for_reporters.json --browser chrome --record --key 5375ae6a-55ac-45ca-8bcd-8b9c4f89c5fa --env configFile=staging
scripts.cypress:run:prod: cypress run --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config_for_reporters.json --browser chrome --record --key 5375ae6a-55ac-45ca-8bcd-8b9c4f89c5fa --env configFile=production
